Mike Pence said the decision to pursue QE2 is an example of the failure of the current policy that mandates the Federal Reserve focus on full employment and inflation. Fed Chairman Ben Bernanke has repeatedly stated that he is confident the central bank has the tools to prevent inflation, and will be monitoring the buyback program for any signs of nascent inflation.
